name: Bridge 64
overview: With the Bridge 64 program we provide you with an electronic version of this popular card game where the computer is your challenging opponent. The program includes 99 different and progressively more difficult levels to keep you well stimulated. Even those who already play at very high levels can find a challenge and learn some new skills. Played with a deck of 52 cards by two opposing pairs defined by their position in the cardinal directions of North, South, East and West. Each player receives 13 cards at the start. High cards are those that have a value in points and the goal is to make the number of tricks that the attacking pair declared at the beginning of the hand. The opposing couple, playing defense, will try to win tricks and deny the attacking team the amount they have bid. One must play in the suit that is led, if possible.
